artist: Artist: François-Joseph Aloncle; Manufacturer: Sèvres Porcelain Factory
description: deep; eight foil; turquoise blue with a large central medallion reserved in white, wreathed with gold leaves and painted with two birds in a landscape, differing from scene on dish 44.42.3; blue underglaze
markings: \'LSL\', in script; \'N\', in script, to right
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
title: Dessert dish from the Rohan service
